These settings are applied on a per member level basis. Start by selecting the member level you want to modify, then adjust the settings for that level below.

column1: Do you want to let members view businesses? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let members view businesses? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow businesses to be viewed.
column2: No, do not allow businesses to be viewed.

column1: Yes, allow viewing of all businesses, even private ones.
column2: Yes, allow viewing of all businesses, even private ones.

column1: Do you want to let members edit businesses? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let members edit businesses? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow members to edit their businesses.
column2: No, do not allow members to edit their businesses.

column1: Yes, allow members to edit their own businesses.
column2: Yes, allow members to edit their own businesses.

column1: Yes, allow members to edit all businesses.
column2: Yes, allow members to edit all businesses.

column1: Do you want to let members delete businesses? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let members delete businesses? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow members to delete their businesses.
column2: No, do not allow members to delete their businesses.

column1: Yes, allow members to delete their own businesses.
column2: Yes, allow members to delete their own businesses.

column1: Yes, allow members to delete all businesses.
column2: Yes, allow members to delete all businesses.

column1: No, do not allow businesses to be created.
column2: No, do not allow businesses to be created.

column1: Do you want to let members upload photos to a business listing? If set to no, the option to upload photos will not appear.
column2: Do you want to let members upload photos to a business listing? If set to no, the option to upload photos will not appear.

column1: Yes, allow photo uploading to businesses.
column2: Yes, allow photo uploading to businesses.

column1: No, do not allow photo uploading.
column2: No, do not allow photo uploading.

Your members will be asked to provide some information about their business listing when creating a new business. Create some business questions that allow them to describe their product in a way that relates to the theme of your community. To reorder the business questions, click on their names and drag them up or down.

Do you want to let members create businesses? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply. This is useful if you want members to be able to view businesses, but only want certain levels to be able to create businesses.

Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can see their business listings. These options appear on your members' "Add Listings" and "Edit Entry" pages. If you do not check any options, settings will default to the last saved configuration. If you select only one option, members of this level will not have a choice.

Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can post comments on their listings. If you do not check any options, settings will default to the last saved configuration. If you select only one option, members of this level will not have a choice.

column1: Enter the maximum number of allowed businesses. The field must contain an integer between 1 and 999.
column2: Enter the maximum number of allowed businesses. The field must contain an integer between 1 and 999.

column1: These settings affect all members in your community.
column2: These settings affect all members in your community.

Select whether or not you want to let the public (visitors that are not logged-in) to view the following sections of your social network. In some cases (such as Profiles, Blogs, and Albums), if you have given them the option, your users will be able to make their pages private even though you have made them publically viewable here. For more permissions settings, please visit the General Settings page.

column1: Yes, the public can view businesses unless they are made private.
column2: Yes, the public can view businesses unless they are made private.

column1: No, the public cannot view businesses.
